channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Streetlight out, 26th October
item.description:
The streetlight mounted to 34-46 Wardour Street (Viet Food) does not light up at night.

item.title: Repeated flytipping by local business or charity, 26th October
item.description:
For the past couple of weeks, a local business has been throwing black bin bags next to the commercial bins on Mission Place, right next to the Orchard Mission building (the bins have been moved prior to the photos being taken). The bin bags are almost immediately picked through by foxes and some people as well. This was cleared once but it's being repeated again and again.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, Mission Place, Peckham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned car on road, 26th October
item.description:
Car has been here for 6 months without any movement. Car is rusted over and gives a theft risk to the area.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Dudlington Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Grass cutting team on Mabley Green shredding plastic again, 26th October
item.description:
The grass cutting team on Mabley Green are shredding plastic and metal litter again, turning bottles and can etc into little pieces that are nearly impossible to pick up. Someone needs to remove the litter first, not shred it with the mowers.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Hillyfield Close, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Stops line faded, 26th October
item.description:
Stop line faded on B, C, E phases - required repainting
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Blackwall Tunnel Northern Approach, Blackwall, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Floods every time it rains, 26th October
item.description:
Not sure if it's a blocked drain, or a lack of drainage - but everytime it rains, this section of Puddle Dock floods ... does Nominative Determinism apply to streets?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Puddle Dock, City of London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: On Croydon Rd, Beckenham opp jct with Belmont Rd, another vehicle is being used as an advertisement / trading device, 25th October
item.description:
On Croydon Rd, Beckenham opp jct with Belmont Rd, another vehicle is being used as an advertisement / trading device - a small Vauxhall car Reg: HT07 JYW - with ads on the bonnet, doors a rear window. The latter rear window ad makes the car in roadworthy as it obstruct the driver rear view. This is the same street trading ad on a car as recently reported in Shortlands Rd, Shortlands. The Public Highway is being used for these cars as advertisement devices.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 319, Croydon Road, Elmers End, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Croydon Road, Elmers End, London

item.title: 3 A4 blue flyposters - Croydon Rd Rec Ground, Croydon Rd railings, Beckenham, 25th October
item.description:
